title: ** Secure Login
preconditions: User is on the login page at https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login
User has entered valid credentials: tomsmith/SuperSecretPassword!
main_flow: User enters valid username (tomsmith) in the username field.
User enters valid password (SuperSecretPassword!) in the password field.
4. The system validates the entered credentials.
5. The system displays a success message: "Login successful."
6. The system redirects the user to the secure area.
The system displays an error message: "Invalid username."
The user can try again by re-entering the username.
The system displays an error message: "Invalid password."
The user can try again by re-entering the password.
postconditions: The user is now logged in and redirected to the secure area.
The user can access secure content or perform actions within the secure area.
**Note:** The use case assumes that the user has the ability to log out and return to the login page. This can be handled in a separate use case for "Logout" functionality.
